item.title: Disable MacOS SSH Password Login
item.description: Create 000-hostname.conf in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d 000-hostname.conf UsePAM no PasswordAuthentication no Restart SSH sudo launchctl stop com.openssh.sshd sudo launchctl start com.openssh.sshd
